title: How The San Francisco Liberals Are Taking Their War Against The NRA To The Next Level
text:
We’ve all known that the American Left hates the National Rifle Association. It represents everything they hate about this country. It represents not just gun owners and Second Amendment supporters, but those who vote Republican, those who are mostly rural, those who participate in hunting culture, those who are from small towns, those who aren’t like the snobby and insufferable morons who infest our country’s cities. The Left hates these people. They’re the lesser-educated country bumpkins who, to them, are preventing this nation from reaching its full potential in the political correctness Olympics. Those who are stopping a far-left extremist agenda, like taxpayer-funded abortion up until the moment of birth. We’re in the way. And because of that, they have to go after the institutions that protect and fight for our interests. In San Francisco, the progressive cesspool of a city decided to label the NRA, the nation’s oldest civil rights organization, a domestic terror group (via Fox News):

The San Francisco Board of Supervisors has passed a resolution declaring the National Rifle Association a “domestic terrorist organization” and urged the federal government to do the same – the latest escalation in the heated rhetoric from Democrats regarding the NRA in the wake of several deadly mass shootings. The resolution, which passed Tuesday and says the U.S. is “plagued by an epidemic of gun violence,” accuses the NRA of using “its considerable wealth and organization strength to promote gun ownership and incite gun owners to acts of violence.” “All countries have violent and hateful people, but only in America do we give them ready access to assault weapons and large-capacity magazines thanks, in large part, to the National Rifle Association’s influence,” the resolution says. The document resolves to assess the relationships that those who do business with the city have with the group and says “the City and County of San Francisco should take every reasonable step to limit those entities who do business with the City and County of San Francisco from doing business with this domestic terrorist organization.” […] "This ludicrous stunt by the Board of Supervisors is an effort to distract from the real problems facing San Francisco, such as rampant homelessness, drug abuse and skyrocketing petty crime, to name a few,” the statement said, according to KTVU. “The NRA will continue working to protect the constitutional rights of all freedom-loving Americans."

There is no such thing as “assault weapons,” so we once again have to deal with the idiocy and ignorance of the Left when it comes to gun rights, firearms, and the U.S. Constitution. Millions of Americans own AR-15 rifles. There are untold millions of high-capacity magazines and violent crime is still low. Even with the recent rash of mass shootings, they’re not increasing in frequency and neither are school shootings. There aren’t enough dead bodies to change my mind on Second Amendment rights. I will remain entrenched in my support for gun rights. So, go ahead—call me a monster, left-wingers. I hate you too.

There has to be a realization that we share next to nothing with these cretins. They’re dangerous. They’re anti-American. And they can’t be trusted. I mean look at San Francisco, a bastion of homelessness, hypodermic needles, and crap everywhere. That’s governance under Democrats for you. So, before you get your rocks off going after the NRA, maybe clean up your own cesspool first.
